post.description: Deposit money into the system  ref_id is optional, service returns generated ref_id if you didn't send it.  acc_no -- number of user's account in the system (optional)  if there isn't acc_no in a request, money will deposit on first activated account
Transfer between two accounts  ref_id is optional, service returns generated ref_id if you didn't send it.

Withdrawal money outside  ref_id is optional, service returns generated ref_id if you didn't send it.  acc_no -- number of user's account in the system  acc_no -- number of user's account in the system

post.description: it("Activate corporate user", async () => {    let data = {      header: {        id: 111,        version: config.apiVersion,        service: "auth-service",        method: "activate"      },      data: {        user_id: global.refUserDepended.id,        code: global.refUserDepended.activateCode      }    };    const res = await sendRequest(data);    res.body.header.should.have.deep.property("status", "OK");    let usr = await db.user.findOne({      where: { id: global.refUserDepended.id }    });    usr.dataValues.should.have.deep.property("activated", true);  });  Login of user under realm session
